attributes.action: Allow online petitions to Parliament to have more than 80 characters in the titl
attributes.additional_details: Up the character limit in petition titles
attributes.background: There is a point where the number of characters in a title stops the title being pithy and ensures that the petition titles become unclear or fatuous

rejection.details:
You could fit the title in by amending it to

"Allow online Parliamentary petitions to use more than 80 characters in the title"
